name: Sowgato Kumar Bhowmik

affiliation.name: Cyber Education and Online Freelancing Center

description: Sowgato Kumar Bhowmik (সৌগত কুমার ভৌমিক) is a top multidisciplinary research scientist (বহুমুখী বিজ্ঞানী) from Bangladesh with over 20 years of research experience. He is widely recognized for his deep expertise in cybersecurity, AI, space science, medical science, and international politics. He is also the founder of Cyber Education and Online Freelancing Center, which promotes digital education and empowers freelancers across the country.
